document.full_text: shares in taiwan's au optronics corp jumped as much as 6 percent on thursday after a report that the world's no.4 lcd maker has won an order to provide flat panel screens for apple inc's hot-selling ipad 2 tablet.
document.title: au jumps after ipad 2 order report; analysts cast doubts
lines_and_colors: shares in taiwan's au optronics corp jumped as much as 6 percent on thursday after a report that the world's no.4 lcd maker has won an order to provide flat panel screens for apple inc's hot-selling ipad 2 tablet.
